MyVitalScan puts your privacy first. We are passionate about the protection of your Personal Information and Personal Health Information and committed to respecting your privacy. MyVitalScan does NOT collect, use or disclose your Personal Information or Personal Health Information. We operate in compliance with all applicable health privacy and other data privacy legislation such as PIPEDA (Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act), GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), and British Columbia’s Personal Information Protection Act. We DO NOT • store your data • take photos • use facial recognition or identify and categorize datasets • retain your personal facial measurements • save images or video streams inputted for measurement
store your data
take photos
use facial recognition or identify and categorize datasets
retain your personal facial measurements
save images or video streams inputted for measurement
All information entered into our mobile app is stored locally on your device. If you want to share this information with any of your TELUS Health Apps, you will be asked for explicit authorization before any data is transferred. MyVitalScan is NOT a medical or diagnostic product. It is aimed at promoting general wellness, and may be used for informational purposes. In order to undergo any treatment of diagnosis, you should consult a medical professional. I have read and agree to MyVitalScan's Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions. For more information about how we protect your data, visit myvitalscan.ca/privacy. MyVitalScan is designed for regular use to monitor health trends 
over time. MyVitalScan is not a medical or diagnostic product. Continue

scan id Your Wellness Score
scan id: %s Ready to begin the screening? This will take less than a minute. Remember to: Keep your face aligned within the indicated frame Remain as still as possible Make sure your face is evenly illuminated Start Scan Stop Stay 2-3 ft away from the screen and make sure your face is visible in the frame Scanning in progress Stay still
High Medium Normal Low Mild N.A. BPM
You are experiencing rPPG (remote photo plethysmographic) imaging! Your heart beats around 100,000 times a day, 35 million times a year, and 2.5 billion times in an average lifetime Our tech works for all skin tones! You actually inhale and exhale through one nostril at a time. Stay still for accurate results. rPPG imaging is proven to be as accurate as traditional, contact-based devices. Not just old folks! Nearly 1 in 4 adults aged 20 to 44 have high blood pressure. Stay as still as possible. Vital signs may vary based on age, time, gender, medication, or a result of the environment. Owning a pet can lower your risk of heart disease. High blood pressure usually doesn't have any symptoms. The brain uses 20% of the body's blood and oxygen. Squeezing a tennis ball is same amount of force as your heart pumps. Lifestyle changes are an effective way to manage health. Slow breathing improves cardiovascular and respiratory functions, and reduces stress.
Scanning in progress | stay still
Face not detected Please point the camera to your face and make sure you are not too far or too close.
Error/Warning Unsupported orientation. Return to portrait mode Unsupported Orientation Return to the portrait mode. Face Too far Please move your face closer to the camera. Tilted Head Please straighten your head. Unenven Lighting Please ensure even distribution of light across your face.
Can be Improved Excellent! Great!
We Care about Privacy

Leave the session? To protect your privacy, you will not be able to return. To access your results again, use %s as SCAN ID at any of our kiosks within the next 3 hours The shape of our Digital 
Healthcare & Wellness
 future just expanded. MyVitalScan offers easy integration into your service flow, 
radically altering our relationship to care and risk.
HEALTHCARE Wellness Insurance
As a global leader in Virtual Health Care, TELUS provides best-in-
class solutions for patients, healthcare professionals, and allied 
organizations. This includes the Collaborative Health Record (CHR), 
MyCare, EMR Virtual Visits, and Home Health Monitoring, all 
delivered through pioneering technology and partnerships. 
 As an entirely mobile-driven solution, MyVitalScan offers a powerful 
new tool to this portfolio. We allow patients to register health 
trends and generate baseline data with unrivaled granularity, 
empowering both users and providers to make proactive, data-
driven wellness choices, while revitalizing key elements across the 
continuum of care:
 Easy integration with existing TELUS solutions allows providers 
to track patient welfare using metrics previously available only 
with additional hardware 8+ biomarkers provide accurate, actionable data to flag potential 
issues, enabling personalized preventive care to truly work at 
scale Remote screening bolsters Digital Front Doors, increasing 
capacity and allowing for effective trigger-based triage, reducing 
administrative burden and wait-times for urgent care Vital sign histories significantly fortify telehealth and eHealth 
solutions, lowering ER and pediatric hospital visits, boosting 
home monitoring, and connecting practitioners with remote 
patients and communities
 At a time when efficient, accessible healthcare is a top priority for all 
Canadians, MyVitalSigns can lower administrative costs, reduce the 
burden on front-line staff, and redefine the provision of remote care.
Scan the QR code and visit our website 
for more information on how MyVitalScan 
can enhance your business and services
As a global leader in health and wellbeing, TELUS knows a 
healthy workforce is vital to growth. This means giving 
employers the solutions for personalized 
and preventive employee care, while equipping employees with tools to 
actively engage in their own wellbeing journeys.
 MyVitalScan's AI-powered metrics add significant value to 
existing solutions like TELUS Health Virtual Care, enhancing 
medical advice, prescriptions, lab-work, referrals, and bespoke 
healthcare. 
 Surveys show 77% of employees are willing to switch jobs 
for better wellbeing support. Our employee-driven tracking 
provides robust analytics to empower data-driven wellbeing 
management to retain talent, curb absenteeism costs, and 
support productivity. 
 Increased stress, burnout, and demand for behavioural 
healthcare resources suggest workplace digital therapy is a 
productive way to prevent and alleviate mental health crises. 
MyVitalScan measures stress levels with clinical accuracy, 
improving virtual therapy, stress relief programs, and 
outcome-oriented remedial care. 
 Engaging employees in wellbeing programs is challenging, and 
with Canadians spending 4.4 hours daily on their smartphones, 
mobile-first strategies are essential to reach users where they 
are. Integration with existing solutions like TELUS Health 
Wellbeing and the LifeJourney EAP can capture data from 
more biomarkers than any other health app, including blood 
pressure, without additional hardware. Our data offers detailed 
insights and actionable data to incentivize behavioural and 
lifestyle changes.

Data & Analytics drives the insurance industry, and its potential 
in the health insurance sector is vast. Collaborative networks 
of wellness ecosystems that include insurers, health providers, 
and workplaces can improve process efficiency, underwriting, 
competitive pricing, client experiences, and more. 
 MyVitalScan’s extensive dataset, usability, and ease of 
integration with existing Claims Management Solutions offers 
additional health metrics to further refine Health Risk 
Assessments and claim decisions. We can: 
 Augment risk management with continuous, periodic data 
monitoring for a real-time view of health-status, which can 
be used to track trends for better predictive analysis 
 Offer dynamic underwriting that incentivizes healthy 
behaviours and lifestyle changes through premiums that are 
immediately responsive to wellness trends 
 Reduce claims frauds by corroborating claims with current and 
historical health data 
 Refine and accelerate Straight-Through-Processing 
models, drastically improving their accuracy with historical 
and up-to-date data 
 Enhance client experiences by expediting onboarding and 
underwriting through a Digital Front Door 
 Support the elderly age in place, making home health 
monitoring easier than ever, and empowering them to lead 
more independent lifestyles 

Download our mobile app for 
regular screening

SHARE WITH TELUS TELUS MyCare allows you to book virtual or in-person appointments with 
your chosen health providers from the convenience of your phone. 
MyVitalScan tracks your health trends with unprecedented detail, and 
integration with MyCare will allow you to upload your screening history and 
make an appointment as soon as risk factors are detected.
 Further integration with health databases like TELUS’ Collaborative 
Health Record empowers your primary care provider 
with new tools to help with virtual diagnoses, treatment, and continuity of care. The following is an example of the data that can be shared with TELUS’ many health solutions:

To help with diagnosis, continue to monitor your vitals to establish a baseline history which can be uploaded to your electronic health record (EHR) for review by medical professionals as it can be useful for early detection of potential health issues. Measurement confidence level:
Welcome to MyVitalScan This is a limited version for demonstration purposes. To measure all 11 vitals, use the MyVitalScan kiosk inside.
Questionnaire How much water do you drink a day? Impact: Keeping your body hydrated helps your heart pump blood more easily and allows oxygen to reach your muscles, which helps the muscles work efficiently. Less than 1 litre Between 1 and 2 litres More than 2 litres How often do you feel tired or fatigued? Some health conditions are linked to lack of sleep such as high blood pressure, Type 2 diabetes and obesity. Never Once a week 1-3 times a week >3 times a week
Rate the following statement "I have a sense of purpose in my life." Understanding your sense of purpose can assess mental health, as a stronger sense of purpose is associated with greater well-being and lower mental health risks. Disagree Neutral Agree Skip
This is a limited scan result for demonstration purposes. Use this kiosk to measure all 11 vitals. Invalid code message User stopped scan
